author: Jeffrey Earl
description:
This module will configure a /etc/sudoers.d/03_jbcustadm file compatible with the Terremark puppet
management of sudoers. It takes a hash of security principles and sudo permissions as a parameter. By
default, it will add the lnxadmins group and the svctib user with full elevation rights.
name: jb-tmsudo
summary: Manage the Teremark sudo include file for jetblue sudo users
